name: Copper Health
headline: Modern patient engagement and remote therapeutic monitoring platform
description: All-in-one RTM platform designed for physical therapy and powered by AI
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:telehealth; industry:b2b; industry:digital-health; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Joanne Wang, Founder
founders.description: Joanne is the co-founder and CEO of Copper Health. Before Copper Health, she was an investor at General Atlantic where she worked on venture and growth investments in the B2B software space. Joanne studied Computing & Data Science and Finance at NYU.

founders.name: Tommy Guo, Founder
founders.description: Tommy is the co-founder & CTO of Copper Health. He was Stripe's first new grad hire in NYC. As a senior software engineer at Stripe, he worked on search infrastructure and led a team to redesign Stripe's API to accept multiple currencies. Tommy studied Computer Science at NYU.

generated_description:
### Copper Health: A New Dawn in Patient Engagement

Founded in 2024, Copper Health is a fresh player in the health-tech arena, emerging from the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W24. With its headquarters in San Francisco and a lean team of just two, Copper is on a mission to forge a modern patient engagement and remote therapeutic monitoring (RTM) platform that’s reshaping physical therapy practices.

Initially developed as a comprehensive RTM solution for physical therapy, Copper Health leverages artificial intelligence to enhance patient compliance and satisfaction. Their platform is a win-win for clinicians and patients alike, promoting ongoing engagement and efficient communication while easing the administrative burdens typically associated with RTM.

**The Offerings:**
1. **AI-Powered Remote Therapeutic Monitoring**: Tailored specifically for physical therapists, Copper Health enables providers to earn meaningful reimbursements (up to $165 per patient monthly) while offering streamlined integration with various Electronic Medical Record (EMR) systems.
   
2. **Seamless Setup**: Their solution is designed to be low-stress; therapists can enroll patients in mere seconds without tedious manual entry—the data management happens automatically, so clinicians can focus on patient care.

3. **Text-Based Engagement**: Forget cumbersome app downloads—patients can interact with the platform through simple text messages, keeping them engaged and informed about their home exercise programs.

**What Makes Copper Stand Out?**
The sheer convenience it provides is significant. Copper Health’s platform not only promises to simplify the RTM process but also actively enhances patient outcomes by facilitating continuous communication. As therapists track progress remotely, patients develop stronger relationships with their clinicians and feel more connected, which ultimately leads to better recovery rates.

**Feedback from Users**:
Testimonials from clinicians and patients dispel any doubt about Copper’s effectiveness. With rave reviews focusing on ease of use, seamless communication, and enhanced patient engagement, it’s clear that the platform is already making waves in therapy practices.

In a nutshell, Copper Health is not just another tech solution; it's a holistic approach to patient engagement that couples advanced technology with genuine care. With its strong foundations in AI and patient-centered design, it’s poised to transform how physical therapy is delivered—and how patients experience their recovery journey.

For more detailed insights, you can visit their website at [Copper Health](https://www.copperhealth.co/).
